channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:52 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region.Creat on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:52 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region.Creat on further messages.#Donetsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 10:52 Drawing of anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
